doc:
Ward Bond https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ward_Bond 0 Wardell Edwin Bond (April 9, 1903 – November 5, 1960) was an American film character actor who appeared in more than 200 films and the NBC television series Wagon Train from 1957 to 1960. Among his best-remembered roles are Bert, the cop, in Frank Capra's It's a Wonderful Life (1946) and Captain Clayton in John Ford's The Searchers (1956). Wardell_Edwin_Bond ( April_9_,_1903 – November_5_,_1960 ) was an_American_film_character_actor who appeared in more_than_200_films and the_NBC_television_series_Wagon_Train from 1957 to 1960 . Among his_best-remembered_roles are Bert , the_cop , in Frank_Capra 's_It 's a_Wonderful_Life_(_1946_) and Captain_Clayton in John_Ford 's_The_Searchers ( 1956_) .
